column4: is there any reason to use a random MAC address on my network card?
or could I just use something simple for me to remember without concern
its put into the card when its made, the first few identify the manufacturer of the device
sudo apt-get --purge remove proftp*; sudo apt-get --purge autoremove
then your packages are out of whack and you need to square them off. You may have to edit some of apt's files to allow the removal
